mainSequence.step: Administrator creates a new instance of Agencia.
Administrator creates a new instance of Furgoneta with specified attributes.
Furgoneta creates a new instance of Vehiculo.
Administrator creates a new instance of Blindado.
Administrator creates a new instance of Premium.
Administrator creates a new instance of Coche with specified attributes.
Administrator registers the Coche vehicle with the Agencia.
Agencia adds the Coche vehicle to its list of vehicles.
